alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 11:43AM CDT until August 25 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Warning for... Southwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 545 PM CDT Thursday. * At 1143 AM CDT, Widespread flooding from very heavy rainfall earlier this morning, where 4 to 6 inches of rain fell, resulted in the flooding of several roadways. Many roads remain flooded and closed and additional rainfall will keep water levels elevated through the afternoon, especially where creeks and streams have come out of their banks. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Coden, Dixon Corner, Saint Elmo and Irvington. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
